WorkItem.ClosedComment: No further comments on my suggestion on how to perform this. Closing.
WorkItem.Description:
Description: Since different encounters needs different healing style, I'm changing part of equipment to feel comfortable. And now to save different healing style i need to save full character to different file and it a little bit annoying to switch between them.
Â 
Suggestion: Add ability to save custom rotations like talents presets.

Comments.Message: I have to agree with this request. I tend to play with more renews in my rotation than what RAWR suggest, yet RAWR doesn't show renew as an option.

Hmm, no immediate plans to do this directly, indirectly you could save your character once for each custom rotation. It has its downsides as you having to add new gear you own multiple times for each rotation. Otherwise you could probably open the XML and manually copy-paste. Not really helpful but I have to think this over.
